summary: An Ordinance amending Sections 4 and 5 of Ordinance No. 37520, approved July 13, 1917, entitled: "An Ordinance providing for additions and betterments to, or extensions of the existing water supply system of the city of Seattle, and specifying and adopting a plan or system therefor, declaring the estimated cost thereof as nearly as may be, providing for the issuance and sale of interest bearing coupon bonds to pay therefor, and for the creation of a special fund into which shall be paid certain revenues of such water supply system to pay the principal and interest of such bonds, and providing for the terms and conditions of said bonds and for their sale", as amended by Ordinance No. 37622, approved August 13, 1917, as amended by Ordinance No. 37660, approved August 30, 19173.
